entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Sync stream serialization not handling IAsyncEnumerable correctly #66687
    7.0.0
  • `System.GC.Server` setting in `runtimeconfig.template.json` is ignored for ASP.NET Core 6.0 #66686
  • JsonSourceGenerationMode.Metadata emits references to internal members from another assembly #66679
  • optSetBlockWeights should not scale blocks that have PGO weights #66678
    7.0.0
  • Provide a COM source generator #66674
    Future
  • HttpConnectionPool.RequestQueue leaking items #66673
  • System.Text.Json.JsonSerializerOptions.GetJsonTypeInfoFromContextOrCreate(Type) assert causing test failures #66672
  • failure in LibraryImportGenerator.UnitTests.ManualTypeMarshallingAnalyzerTests.UninstantiatedGenericNativeTypeOnGenericWithArityMatch_DoesNotReportDiagnostic #66668
  • [API Proposal]: Attribute for mark functions returning rent arrays from some pool #66667
  • JsonNode does not respect PropertyNamingPolicy #66661
  • Unable to send multiple certificates in request using .net core 3.1 within HttpClientHandler #66660
  • [NativeAOT] Calling GVM on a struct in generic code is crashing with AV #66659
  • GetSatelliteAssembly() not throwing FileNotFoundException as documented #66656
  • Ability to collect infromation about an assembly load context in profiling API #66653
  • LdapConnection.SendRequest cause a segfault on linux #66652
  • [JIT] CodeVersionManager::LockHolder lock(Profiler ReJIT?) #66649
    7.0.0
  • SmtpClient SendMail/SendMailAsync not encoding subject correctly with Office365 SMTP server #66648
  • AOT build failure - out of memory #66647
  • dotnet/optimization builds are broken #66646
  • System.IO.Pipelines inifinite wait PipeReader.ReadAtLeastAsync(Int32, CancellationToken) #66645
  • Regressions in System.Tests.Perf_GC<Char> and ByteMark #66665
  • Test failure GC/Scenarios/DoublinkList/dlbigleakthd_v2/dlbigleakthd_v2.sh #66643
  • Perf measurement changed due to BDN update #66664
  • Regressions in System.Buffers.Text.Tests.Utf8FormatterTests #66663
  • Linux Sockets: Reduce overhead and simplify code in SocketAsyncContext #66639
  • Cannot use BenchmarkDotNet with NativeAOT #66637
  • Reference source for System.Security.Cryptography is generated inconsistently between platforms #66634
    7.0.0
  • NegotiateStreamPal.Unix.cs does not support default auth #66633
  • Test failure System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandler_HttpClientHandler_Cancellation_Test_Http2.Expect100Continue_WaitsExpectedPeriodOfTimeBeforeSendingContent #66632
  • Test failure file_io.GetSystemTime.test1 #66630
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\X86\\Sse41\\ConvertToVector128_ro\\ConvertToVector128_ro.cmd #66629
    7.0.0
  • Test failure GC/API/GCHandle/Alloc_neg2/Alloc_neg2.sh #66626
  • Test failure JIT/Performance/CodeQuality/BenchmarksGame/regex-redux/regex-redux-5/regex-redux-5.sh #66625
    7.0.0
  • ushort argument mysteriously mutated #66624
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Implementations of marshallers using `CustomTypeMarshallerAttribute` #66623
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Content-validating AsnDecoder.ReadEncodedValue #66622

Closed

  • TerraFx.Interop.Windows is not getting trimmed when compiled using NativeAOT #66593
  • Running .NET 5.0 on WindRiver 18 ARM throws SegV #55911
    Future
  • Use cmeq, cmge, cmgt (zero) when one of the operands is Vector64/128<T>.Zero #33972
    7.0.0
  • Fix setup-stress-dependencies #48015
    Future
  • Visual Studio debugger does not work for CoreLib checked builds #52768
    7.0.0
  • [Linux/arm64] System.Net.NameResolution.Tests randomly fail #11437
    Future
  • area-Extensions-DependencyInjection About creating custom service providers #66394
  • [API Proposal]: RateLimiter should implement IDisposable and IAsyncDisposable #62370
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: MemoryStreamExtensions #65610
  • ARM32 register conflict for large stack frames and tailcalls #66585
    7.0.0
  • SslStreamNetworkStreamTest failing intermitently on OSX #46837
    Future
  • HttpListenerContext.AcceptWebSocketAsync unsupported for IWindowsPrincipal in .NET Core 3.1 #63738
    Future
  • System.Text.Json.Tests crashing from `Debug.Assert` in `JsonSerializerOptions.GetJsonTypeInfoFromContextOrCreate` #66469
    7.0.0
  • System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests timing out on CI #66023
  • [arm32/linux] Assert failure: dwSrcIndex > dwLastSrcIndex in ABI stress #13241
    7.0.0
  • Span: Move length check to ctor #66669
  • GC regions failure in System.Threading.Tests.dll #66601
    7.0.0
  • Need more tests for non-DualMode socket usage #16602
    Future
  • Test failure tracing/eventpipe/complus_config/name_config_with_pid/name_config_with_pid.sh #66276
  • Test failure tracing\\eventpipe\\reverse\\reverse\\reverse.cmd #66278
    7.0.0
  • about httpclient #66258
  • Some `System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests` tests are timing out #66059
    7.0.0
  • Make it safer and easier to build an X500DistinguishedName #44738
    7.0.0
  • IPGlobalProperties.GetIPGlobalProperties().GlobalProperties.GetActiveTcpConnections() causes memory leak #64735
  • NativeAOT InvalidCastException while compiling a generic mess #66573
  • Test failure GC/Scenarios/BinTree/thdtreegrowingobj/thdtreegrowingobj.sh #66644
  • Remove workarounds for missing "parameterless struct" C# feature #63120
    7.0.0
  • Json Deserialization of "dynamic" does not work #66638
  • Test failure System.Numerics.Vectors.Tests #66583
  • Build failure in CI: LLVM AOT cross-compile CoreCLR tests #66556
  • Add class X509SubjectAlternativeNameExtension.cs : X509Extension #66613
  • Test failure GC/Scenarios/ServerModel/servermodel/servermodel.sh #59611
    7.0.0
  • GC region related failure on alpine #66631
  • Stop using Socket directly in HttpConnection #63710
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: `Math.Percentile(double[] sequence, double percentile)` #66454
  • Change SocketsHttpHandler's default ConnectTimeout to a reasonable finite value #66297
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [IGNORE][wasm] debugging aot on CI #66685
    arch-wasm
  • [release/6.0] Add missing Oracle RIDs #66684
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Await pending client authentication task before disposing #66682
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Update Roslyn Testing SDK #66681
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Merged wrapper support for test exclusion lists #66680
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Surface native sourcelink on CoreCLR native PDBs for easier dump debugging #66677
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Reenable CA 4701 #66676
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • Fix too narrow loads while unspilling #66675
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove test coverage of FeatureSIMD=0 #66670
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Always append the "dll" extension for native libraries loads on Windows #66666
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Methods on primitives 65707 #66654
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Add current-outgoing-connect-attempts counter to Sockets #66651
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 7.0.0
  • Implement missing SymUnmanaged* interfaces #66650
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Address a few TODOs on S.S.C.Cose. #66641
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Fix ReplaceModuleMapping for 32bit binary on 64bit kernel #66640
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • fix pal test #66636
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Upgrading the version of Package Validation used in the repo to reduce Build flakiness when loading Roslyn #66635
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Merged

  • Remove 4267 suppression from mono #66552
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix check for IsTrimmable metadata #66658
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add withAssert flag in getTierName method #66662
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update maui SDK to 6.0.3xx #66671
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix stepping issues with ReadyToRun and TieredCompilation #66491
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix register conflict between freeing large stack frames and fast tailcalls on arm32 #66588
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reenable SslStreamNetworkStreamTests on OSX #66393
    area-System.Net.Security
  • support WindowsPrincipal in HttpListenerWebSocketContext #65746
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [release/5.0] Backport AVX context fix #66120 #66356
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr
  • Ensure serializer reflection-dependency sentinel is accurate #66522
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Fix assert for ARM shuffle thunk #66642
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add vector measurements to the bench Sample #66655
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix for assert failure in distribute free regions #66657
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [Mono] Intrinsify Vector conversion methods #66597
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Implement X500DistinguishedNameBuilder #66509
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [Mono] Intrinsify Vector unary plus operator #66586
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Some small copy propagation changes #66582
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use C# 10's enhanced struct initialization features #63131
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Intrinsify Vector dot product #66589
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Revert "[Mono] Enable emitting intrinsics for System.Numerics.Vector<T> on arm64" #66598
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Remove _socket field from HttpConnection #66416
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Add vcsjones to more area tags in fabric bot #66628
    area-Meta
  • Tweak SuperPMI collections #66627
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: enable reading PGO data when switching to optimized #66618
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/5.0] Remove usages of native bootstrapping (#65901) #66406
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add xarch `blsi` #66193
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Set SocketsHttpHandler's default connect timeout to 15s #66607
    area-System.Net.Http
  • A bunch of small regex tweaks #66572
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0

Updated

  • ARM64 - Optimizing a % b operations part 2 #66407
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement NativeLibrary.GetEntryPointModuleHandle #57610
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Load C++/CLI DLLs built against .NET 7.0+ in default ALC #66486
    area-Host
  • Inject existing object into MEF2 #66364
    area-System.Composition, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Refactoring and perf of reflection Invoke #66357
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • WIP: Pack Stopwatch into a single long #66619
    area-System.Diagnostics, community-contribution
  • [Group 3] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging` #65262
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Issue 62532 config binding #66267
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Expose `LibraryImportAttribute` #66434
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Add metrics for caching #66479
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching
  • [wasm][debugger] First draft of debug on firefox #61776
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Allow symbols 3 external symbols into the gcc/gcov library. #64236
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Improves handling of env prefixes containing __ #65757
    breaking-change, area-Extensions-Configuration, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Fixes Binding to non-null IEnumerable doesn't work #36390 #66131
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Improve `QuicImplementationProviders.MsQuic.IsSupported` for TLS1.3 On Windows #66019
    area-System.Net.Quic, community-contribution
  • Clean-up CacheEntry #59110
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [wasm] try this with icu updated #66528
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • ARM64 - Emitting `msub` instruction #66621
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [API Implementation]: DirectoryInfo.CopyTo / Directory.Copy #62375
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [draft] hot reload WIP #66455
    NO-MERGE, area-EnC-mono
  • Introduce write barriers in wasm bindings, migrate to ref/out params, add gc safe regions #65994
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Remove dotnet6 feeds #66447
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Clean up redundant type checks after GDV #55124
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable some ARM32 tests #66553
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Publish crossgen as AOT if supported by the target platform #65948
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Add additional trace to HttpConnectionPool #66605
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Add the CustomTypeMarshallerAttribute type to make it easier to identify marshaller types #65591
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • skip the test when dotnet.exe is locked #66196
    area-System.IO, test-enhancement, 7.0.0
  • DebuggerDisplay Stopwatch #65753

  • [release/6.0] Fix macOS ARM64 stack overflow detection #66612

    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove WebRequest from SoundPlayer #65854

    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Draft for Min/Max intrinsics xarch (#65625) #65700
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Console.ReadKey should print a char, not an integer #66609
    area-System.Console
  • Improve NamedPipeClientStream.Connect edge cases handling #65553
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Fix for number of used frame infos during crossgen2 compilation #64549

  • Fix MemoryPool<byte>.Shared.MaxBufferSize seems incorrect #61755
